Inventory Sync System V5
========================================

Version: 5.3
Build Date: 2025/12/03 ¶g¤T 18:54:17.98

New Features in V5.3:
- Spec format normalization in database storage
- Yahoo expired product filtering (8,795 products filtered)
- Automatic spec extraction from product names
- Complete Google Sheets integration
- Dashboard web interface
- Cross-platform inventory comparison

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed Stock_Comparison duplicate records issue
- Ensured all spec_name values have / prefix

Components:
- ExpiredProductManager: Manages 22,050 Yahoo products
- Updated yahoo_client.py with filtering
- Enhanced database schema with history tables
- Complete sync_manager with spec normalization
- Dashboard web interface

Usage:
1. Delete old inventory.db
2. Run InventorySync_V5.exe
3. Open dashboard/index.html in browser
4. View sync results and inventory data
